Title: Relates to incarcerated individuals wages
Summary: Relates to incarcerated individuals wages; provides that incarcerated individuals shall be compensated at a base rate of $1.20 to $10 per day and shall be given biannual raises for adequate performance; provides that incarcerated individuals not participating in a work or program assignment due to age or frailty shall be paid $1.00 per day, adjusted every 5 years for cost of living.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the correction law, in relation to incarcerated individuals wages
